programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: After Jan busts Michael for having a "movie Monday," Angela pushes Dwight to make a play for Michael's job.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael tries to help the staff grieve after learning that the former regional manager has died.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight takes Ryan on his first sales call, subjecting him to an outrageous series of tests along the way.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael urges the staff to support Kelly and attend a local celebration of the Hindu Festival of Lights.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael strives to keep the staff's spirit up after learning of the Scranton branch shutting down; people envision how their lives will change.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Old friends Jim and Pam are back together after months apart as the Scranton branch and Stamford branch are finally merged.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the disappearance of two high-school students from a museum field-trip; Stabler meets his new partner.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) are unable to build a case against a rape suspect until a new witness (Leslie Caron) steps forward.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an assailant rapes his victim twice, detectives Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) link the case to other victims of multiple rapes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Novak calls upon detective Benson, still under cover in Oregon, to present evidence that will strengthen the case against a brutal rapist.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular teen is sexually assaulted, Benson and Stabler delve into a modeling underworld of thoughtless parents, drug-dealing doctors and a trendy agency executive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A homeless man is a suspect in the rape and murder of a mother and daughter; it turns out to be Munch's uncle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A local police captain (Kim Delaney) questions Benson when she investigates a rape outside her jurisdiction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Chris "Ludacris" Bridges) connected to Fin's son goes on trial for the murders of a woman and her baby.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler's job and personal life intertwine when his daughter Kathleen becomes a suspect in a case; after learning that Kathleen may have an emotional disorder, he turns to his estranged mother (Ellen Burstyn) for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous astronaut is found floating in the waters of Battery Park, Detectives Benson and Stabler think the murder may be connected to a string of serial rapes; at a dead end, Stabler seeks advice from an old mentor (James Brolin).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl at Detective Stabler's daughter's school accuses another student of rape; ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) returns to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Olivia's half-brother shows up looking for help when child services threatens to take his kids away; the investigation into an abandoned baby found by a homeless couple leads to a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad tries to keep Detective Rollins' sister safe from her abusive boyfriend when she turns up beaten and pregnant; when Rollins is forced to take drastic action, an internal affairs investigation begins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Carisi's sister's fiancé falls back into bad habits and accuses his parole officer of rape, Carisi must investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexually assaulted athlete's secret double life could destroy her Olympic career and ruin the case against her attacker; Rollins' sister is released from prison on parole.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy disappears after meeting up with an online gamer; Benson suspects her son is being bullied.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student's school reports a girl missing, the squad must track down a trusted family friend for answers; Benson gets a Mother's Day surprise.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the squad celebrates the birth of Rollins and Carisi's child, another child goes missing in broad daylight.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a girl's disappearance leads to a high-tech kidnapper who uses the Internet to cover his tracks; Rollins reconnects with her sister.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba's efforts to make an arrest in a case involving pornographic photos is stalled when several suspects come down with the measles; Amaro receives distressing news about his son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular teen is sexually assaulted, Benson and Stabler delve into a modeling underworld of thoughtless parents, drug-dealing doctors and a trendy agency executive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A homeless man is a suspect in the rape and murder of a mother and daughter; it turns out to be Munch's uncle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A local police captain (Kim Delaney) questions Benson when she investigates a rape outside her jurisdiction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Olivia's half-brother shows up looking for help when child services threatens to take his kids away; the investigation into an abandoned baby found by a homeless couple leads to a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A distraught pregnant woman threatens suicide, claiming that her child is a product of rape, but when the case goes to trial, the woman's willingness to settle for cash makes detectives suspicious.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect that Gabriel Thurman, an activist trying to stop the spread of AIDS, murdered a homosexual couple who had a new form of HIV.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler and CSU technician Millie Vizcarrondo (Paula Garcés) investigate a child's remains found at a construction site and find they belong to one of five boys reported missing 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cancer patient (Brian Dennehy) makes a deathbed confession involving a number of crimes from decades earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an envelope containing a picture appears at the precinct, the detectives pick up the trail of a child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Four honor students are arrested for criminally negligent homicide when another student dies at a party that they threw.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives believe a woman's death to be a professional hit when they discover that terrorists have threatened her CIA-agent fiance (Dylan Walsh).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage boy is killed in what appears to be a play fight, the victim's friend claims he filmed the death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a video gamer goes missing, Benson and Stabler use the woman's avatar to track down her kidnapper before it is too late.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives link the stabbing death of a schoolteacher to her volunteer job at a victims rehabilitation center, where she was working with an Iraqi who helped uncover some military secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a collegian is found dead in her formalwear, detectives recognize the body's mutilation as that of the copycat of a serial killer; a woman goes missing, and comic books are the key to finding her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The powerful family behind a retail empire defends one of its own from a bartender's rape accusation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A top-level investment banker accuses her billionaire client of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man under investigation for rape and murder threatens to expose the secrets of those who are working on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a woman claims a charismatic spiritual healer used hypnosis to incapacitate her and assault her.
